roleset.name: grow up, age; the inchoative event as it takes place
roleset.note: MATURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mature' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'growup'.(from mature.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: already grown up, adult-like

example.name: mature-j: medical usage
example.text: The cut surface is lobulated, yellow, mature, adipose, interspersed with focal white-tan dense fibrous tissue.

example.name: maturity-n:
example.text: The cut surface is lobulated, yellow, mature, adipose, interspersed with focal white-tan dense fibrous tissue.

roleset.note: MATURITY-N NOTES: Added by Julia for unification MATURE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison tomature.01. Mature.01 is a member of VN classes grow-26.2 andother_cos-45.4.Framed by Katie. (from mature.01-j)

roleset.name: cause to mature

example.name: maturate-v: Maturer as subject, with product
example.text: His writing maturated into a tale well told.

example.name: maturate-v: Invented example, all arguments
example.text: John the scientist maturated the seeds into seedlings.

example.name: maturity-n: This roleset because it has an agent
example.text: But what we didn't see was his maturity of the fundamentals.

example.name: maturity-n: args 1 and 3
example.text: The relationship between a parent and child is necessary to the maturity of the child into a healthy and well-adjusted adult.
example.arg: into a healthy and well-adjusted adult

example.name: maturity-n: args 1, 2 and 3
example.text: We witness her maturity from a scared, terrified teen to a woman understanding and accepting her fate.
example.arg: to a woman understanding and accepting her fate

example.name: maturity-n: just arg1
example.text: Boston Safe Deposit 's performance has been hurt this year by a mismatch in the maturities of its assets and liabilities .

example.name: maturation-n: Args 1 and 3
example.text: The maturation of his writing into a tale well told

roleset.note:
MATURATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB and sense groupings. VN entry 26.2. Framed by Claire (from maturate.01-v)
MATURITY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on . Member of VNcls grow-26.2,other_cos-45.4. (from maturity.01-n)
MATURATION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to maturate.01. Maturate.01 is a member of VN class grow-26.2. Framed by Katie. (from maturation.01-n)
